chapters.title: Chapter 13: What Must Be Done
chapters.info: Ordeith, p. 278—Name assumed by Padan Fain when he became an officer among the Children of the Light. The name means “Wormwood” in the Old Tongue. According to Dain Bornhald, it was Ordeith who killed Perrin's parents. He tore them apart, leaving blood everywhere, after Perrin's father insulted him. See also Fain, Padan.
